Texts.Eng:
NO, THEY'RE NOT VAMPIRES, JUST A WEIRD GENETICALLY MUTATED HORSE. To be honest though, dark biomes put no scare to those.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Max Food x^green;1.5^reset;, Health & Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, Fall Damage x^green;0.5^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;50^reset;% Poison, +^green;20^reset;% Shadow
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Darkness, Poison

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Dark: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;10^reset;% E. Regen, -^green;5^reset;% Hunger Drain
  Grassy/Wooded: Energy x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;5^reset; Speed & Jump. +^green;5^reset;% Physical Resist.
  Alien/Fleshy: Energy x^red;0.9^reset;, Damage x^red;0.85^reset;, -^red;15^reset;% E. Regen
  Cold/Hot: Health x^red;0.9^reset;, -^red;13^reset;% speed & jump and -^red;40^reset;% E. Regen

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Magnorbs: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance
  Thrown: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Dual Daggers: +^green;17.5^reset;% Crit Damage, +^green;6^reset;% Speed
  Dagger: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  -^red;10^reset;% Charisma, Damage x^red;0.85^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic, -^red;25^reset;% Ice, Electric
